question: Which short story writer has bagged 2018 Sahitya Academy Award for the Kashmiri language?
explanation: Mushtaq Ahmad Tantray, a prominent Kashmiri short-story writer and eminent broadcaster,  bagged 2018 Sahitya Academy Award for his collection of short stories “AAKH’’. Mr Tantray is presently posted as Head of the Regional News Unit at Radio Kashmir Srinagar. “AAKH”,  a collection of eighteen short stories, published in 2012 had earlier bagged the best book award in Kashmiri at the state level from State Academy of Art, Culture and Languages for the year 2014.
